"1.某种商品的进价为a元/件，在销售旺季，商品售价较进价高30%；销售旺季过后，商品又以7折（即原售价的70%）的价格开展促销活动，这时一件该商品的售价为 ( ) 。

A. a元

B. 0.7a元

C. 0.91a元

D. 1.03a元", "width": 594, "height": 278, "leftTopX": 0, "leftTopY": 60, "rightBottomX": 594, "rightBottomY": 338, "answer": [{ "content": "C", "width": 53, "height": 30, "leftTopX": 124, "leftTopY": 78, "rightBottomX": 177, "rightBottomY": 108 }] }, { "type": "question", "content": "2.11个橘子分给3个小朋友，不要求每个小朋友分得的橘子一样多，但要求分得的橘子个数是单数。想一想，能分吗，请选出正确的选项 ( ) 。

A. 能

B. 不能

C. 不确定", "width": 594, "height": 210, "leftTopX": 0, "leftTopY": 338, "rightBottomX": 594, "rightBottomY": 548, "answer": [{ "content": "A", "width": 53, "height": 30, "leftTopX": 498, "leftTopY": 48, "rightBottomX": 551, "rightBottomY": 78 }] }] }] }

{"width":660,"height":982,"children":[{"type":10006,"width":594,"height":252,"leftTopX":33,"leftTopY":0,"rightBottomX":627,"rightBottomY":252,"children":[{"type":"title","content":"一、客观填空题","width":594,"height":60,"leftTopX":0,"leftTopY":0,"rightBottomX":594,"rightBottomY":60,"answer":[]},{"type":"question","content":"1.一个口袋里有大小相同的红球、黄球、蓝球、绿球各3个，至少拿出 ______ 个就能保证一定能拿出相同颜色的球。（拿出的球不放回）","width":594,"height":96,"leftTopX":0,"leftTopY":60,"rightBottomX":594,"rightBottomY":156,"answer":[{"content":"______","width":54,"height":30,"leftTopX":0,"leftTopY":48,"rightBottomX":54,"rightBottomY":78}]},{"type":"question","content":"2.少年宫乒乓球培训班有52名学员，他们分别来自10所小学，那么参加培训人数最多的一所小学来的人数一定超过 ______ 人。","width":594,"height":96,"leftTopX":0,"leftTopY":156,"rightBottomX":594,"rightBottomY":252,"answer":[{"content":"______","width":54,"height":30,"leftTopX":324,"leftTopY":48,"rightBottomX":378,"rightBottomY":78}]}]},{"type":10001,"width":594,"height":486,"leftTopX":33,"leftTopY":252,"rightBottomX":627,"rightBottomY":738,"children":[{"type":"title","content":"二、选择题","width":594,"height":60,"leftTopX":0,"leftTopY":0,"rightBottomX":594,"rightBottomY":60,"answer":[]},{"type":"question","content":"1.要给房间的四面墙壁和屋顶涂上不同的颜色，但结果是至少有两面的颜色是一样的，颜料的颜色最多是 ( ) 种。
